mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS fkSubscriberId, t.fk_wx_user_id AS fkWxUserId, ta.id AS fkArticleId, ta.class_time AS classTime FROM t_subscriber t INNER JOIN t_article ta ON ta.fk_menu_id = t.fk_menu_id AND ta.`status` = '1' AND ta.delete_state = '0' AND ta.class_time = t.last_class_time + 1 WHERE DATEDIFF(DATE(NOW()), t.end_time) >= ( SELECT tp.para_value FROM t_para tp WHERE tp.para_name = 'interval' ) AND t.`status` = '0';

SELECT t.id AS menuId, ta.id AS articleId, t.`name` AS menuName, ta.sub_title AS subTitle, CASE WHEN ts.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isSubscriber, sn.num AS subscriberNum, un.updateNum AS updateNum, tc.img AS menuImg, point AS point FROM t_menu t INNER JOIN t_article ta ON t.id = ta.fk_menu_id AND ta.delete_state='0' AND ta.type='0' AND ta.`status` = '1' LEFT JOIN t_subscriber ts ON ts.fk_menu_id = t.id AND ts.fk_wx_user_id = #{wxUserId} AND ts.`status` ='0' LEFT JOIN (SELECT fk_menu_id,COUNT(1) num FROM t_subscriber WHERE `status`='0' GROUP BY fk_menu_id) sn ON sn.fk_menu_id = t.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT fk_menu_id,MAX(class_time) updateNum FROM t_article WHERE delete_state='0' AND `status` = '1' GROUP BY fk_menu_id) un ON un.fk_menu_id = t.id LEFT JOIN t_column tc ON tc.fk_menu_id = t.id WHERE t.id LIKE '10%' AND t.type = '1' AND t.delete_state ='0'
